Welcome to HelyOS Agent helper library’s documentation!¶

Introduction¶

This library aims to help the integration of vehicles and robots with helyOS.

Install¶

Latest release

pip install helyos_agent_sdk

Development release candidates

Check out for versions Here

pip install --index-url https://test.pypi.org/simple/  --extra-index-url https://pypi.org/simple helyos_agent_sdk

  helyos_agent_sdk.models

Usage Examples:

  • Examples
    • Connect to helyOS via AMQP
    • Connect to helyOS via MQTT
    • Create an Agent Connector and publish messages to helyOS
    • Use the agent connector to receive messsages from helyOS
